divs: Sighting DetailsWell, these lights are pretty frequent here, not on a daily or weekly basis but every few months we go through spurts here that we see strange rows of orangle lights or orangle ball up in the sky. I was driving home from work and saw a row of orange lights come on then quickly go out. Then a few seconds later they came on again in the same pattern and quickly faded out again. Didn't see them again after that. I arrived at my house about 2 minutes after I saw them and looked in the direction of where I saw the lights and saw nothing. About 5 minuets later a Military Jet Zoomed over my area coming in the opposite direction of those lights. We have B-1's and C-130's here where I live the lights were not those and the Military Jet was also not the normal B-1 or C-130 we see here. I see those planes frequently and it was a smaller plane than the B-1.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around January 21st 2010
